Name: Ball Challenge
About the game: Are you able to accept this challenge and show that you have mastered the physics in the game? With a retro pixel art look, Ball Challenge is a hard game that requires a lot of skill and agility from the player to go through all it's challenges. Dodge monsters, spikes and traps, collect the necessary diamonds and try to reach the end of each level. Controls: Hold the left mouse button to aim. Release it to move the ball; Right mouse button: cancel the movement; R: restart the level; ESC: pause; Credits: 'Songs & Tokens' by Sara Garrard (Edits made: compress quality/cut) Lever sprite by: Jan Schneider Some tileset/sprites by: blackdragon1727
Meta Title: Ball Challenge: Mar 30, 2021, André Holtz and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Ball Challenge? Check out the release date (Mar 30, 2021), developer insights from André Holtz, and a complete game summary.
